name: Space Walls
description:
Title: Space Walls
Platform: Browser Game
Genre: Platformer
Rating: E
Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers
Game Overview: Pinned against a wall and a sharp place you have no choice but to fight your way out! This was a homework assignment for CSG-3813.
Instructions:
Use the mouse to aim and blast away the green walls.
Each level has its own points goal reach it to finish the level.
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Game Design Team
Brennan Crowder – Game Designer/Developer
